en.title: FE at Mind, Body, Spirit Festival, Sydney, Australia 06th November 2008.
en.content:
REPORT FROM AUSTRALIAN COUNTRY LICENSEE, MR. VASU THANDARAYAN:

FUSIONEXCEL AUSTRALIA DEBUT AT SYDNEY’S MIND BODY SPIRIT FESTIVAL

Fusionexcel Quantum Products made an impressive debut at Sydney’s Mind Body Spirit Festival last weekend, 06th - 09th November 2008. Held at the Sydney Exhibition Centre in Darling Harbour, FE booth drew good crowds throughout the four days with an estimated 17,000 people visiting the festival.

"I am impressed", "funny", "it works", "unbelievable" and "incredible" were the common expressions continually heard from visitors to FE booth after taking part in demos with FE members. Among those who went away impressed were leaders and practitioners of the local alternative healing industry, MBS Festival Sales Manager Jodie Murray, Nova Magazine Advertising Manager Stewart Dawes and numerous sports people. "Lifting" of a 130 kg patron amazed the audience.

FE members who took part were new members Ivica John Baric, Slavko Jovicic, Christina Zhao, Lily Soo and Rebecca Jacob. Josy Doyle, New Zealand Country Licensee, 3 Presidential Directors from KL - Rachel Thomas, Albert Phang and Patricia Thava strongly supported the Australian FE team. FE Australia participation at the event was organised by Australian Country Licensee, Vasu and made possible with the strong support from FE KL.

The MBS Sydney Festival produced some excellent outcomes for FE Australia – it proved to be a good training ground and confidence building event amongst new FE members, a soft introduction of FE Quantum Products and their benefits to the Sydney public and acceptance by the acceptance by alternative healing practitioners.

FE Australia will make debut at the Melbourne Mind Body Spirit Festival later this month.
